Photos > Shanghai, China. October 2001

last update: 2002-08-22

With Dora (mom), Deanna (sister) and Magaret... A 4-day trip to Shanghai after we went to Chang Mai (Thailand)... before we went to Hokkaido (Japan)... Conclusion: Dragonair has the prettiest flight attendents (vs. Thai Air, JAL and Cathay Pacific)
